org.gbif.portal.action

Class BaseSearchAction<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseAction
        • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseSearchAction<T,P,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the content type of the results
    P - the search parameter enum
    R - the request type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseFacetedSearchAction, SearchAction

    public abstract class BaseSearchAction<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<P>>
extends BaseAction
    Class that encapsulates the basic functionality of free text search and paginated navigation. The class expects a SearchRequest at creation time and delegates the parsing of search parameters to the concrete subclass that needs to implement readFilterParams().
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getHighlightedText

        public static String getHighlightedText(String text,
                        int maxLength)
        Takes a highlighted text and trimmed it to show the first highlighted term. The text is found using the HL_PRE and HL_POST tags. Ensure that at least the whole term is shown or else MAX_LONG_HL_FIELD are displayed.
        Parameters:
        text - highlighted text to be trimmed.
        maxLength - maximum length of resulting string, ignoring the highlighting tags
        Returns:
        a trimmed version of the highlighted text

      • isHighlightedText

        public static boolean isHighlightedText(String text)
        Used by UI to determine if a text is highlighted.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:

      • limitHighlightedText

        public static String limitHighlightedText(String highlightedText,
                          int max)
        Takes a highlighted text and returns the given number of initial characters, not counting html tags and making sure we always keep html tags intact and closed.
        Parameters:
        highlightedText - the highlighted text to be abbreviated
        Returns:
        the beginning of the highlighted text up to a given number of characters

      • removeHighlighting

        public static String removeHighlighting(String highlightedText)
        Takes a highlighted text and removes all tags used for highlighting.
        Parameters:
        highlightedText - the highlighted text to be cleaned
        Returns:
        a cleaned plain text version of the highlighted text

      • readFilterParams

        public void readFilterParams()
        Implement this method to parse the filter parameters from the request and populate the request parameters. Make sure that empty parameters are set too to filter null values!

      • translateFilterValue

        protected String translateFilterValue(P param,
                          String value)
        Optional hook for concrete search actions to define custom translations of filter values before they are send to the search service. For example to enable a simple checklist=nub filter without the need to know the real nub UUID. The values will NOT be translated for the UI and request parameters, only for the search and title lookup service! This method can be overriden to modify the returned value, by default it keeps it as it is.
        Parameters:
        param - the filter parameter the value belongs to
        value - the value to translate or return as is
